extension_name.description: The display name for the extension.

extension_description.message: Route web links through Proxly for intelligent browser selection
extension_description.description: Description of what the extension does.

statusEnabled.description: Status text when extension is enabled

statusDisabled.description: Status text when extension is disabled

toggleDescription.message: When enabled, external links will be routed through Proxly

linkHandlingMode.description: Section header for link handling options

modeAllLinks.description: Option for capturing all external links

modeAllLinksDescription.message: All external links automatically routed through Proxly

modeContextOnly.description: Option for context menu only mode

modeContextOnlyDescription.message: Use right-click "Open with Proxly" to capture links
modeContextOnlyDescription.description: Description for context menu only mode

contextMenuTitleAll.message: Open with Proxly (all links mode active)
contextMenuTitleAll.description: Context menu item title when in all links mode

accessibilityLinkCapture.message: Link will be opened with Proxly
accessibilityLinkCapture.description: Accessibility announcement when link is captured

errorProxlyNotRunning.message: Proxly is not running or not responding
errorProxlyNotRunning.description: Error message when Proxly is not available

settingsSubtitle.message: Configure how the extension handles web links

modeDescription.message: Choose how the extension handles link clicks

feedbackDescription.message: Configure visual and audio feedback when links are captured

visualFeedbackDescription.message: Display a brief visual indicator when links are captured

soundFeedbackDescription.message: Play a subtle sound when links are captured

checkingProxlyApp.description: Status message while checking Proxly app

requirementProxlyApp.message: Proxly app must be installed and running on your Mac

requirementPermissions.message: Extension requires permission to access all websites

requirementContextMenu.message: Use right-click context menu or enable "capture all" mode

helpAndSupport.description: Link text for help and support
